trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SEQ_00<tab>Baidur is not very good at his job.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Baidur.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_000<tab>Oh, I am beginning to wonder if I will ever be able to sell my wares. I was so certain I could finally make a success of myself here as a trader...
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_001<tab>Ah, hello there. Tell me, have you ever tried your hand at running your own market stall?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_002<tab>I myself have been struggling to sell much of anything of late. Observing someone else may be just what I need.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_003<tab>Let me know if you feel up to the challenge.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_010<tab>Are you willing to tend to my stall?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>Tending to the merchant's stall will take several minutes. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q1_000_011<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_014<tab>That is a shame indeed. Please do speak with me again if you change your mind.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_015<tab>Fantastic! I have a feeling I am going to learn a lot from observing you.

TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_016<tab>I have always prided myself on having a varied assortment of goods for sale. There should be something here for every kind of customer. The best of luck to you!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>Listen carefully to each customer and choose something you think will meet their needs.

TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HOUSEWIFE02755_000_020<tab>Oh my, quite a selection of food you have. Let me think, yesterday we had fish... Trader, what would you recommend for a bunch of growing boys with healthy appetites?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q2_000_021<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A2_000_022<tab>Grilled fish.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A2_000_023<tab>Cheese.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A2_000_024<tab>Mammoth thigh.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A2_000_025<tab>A tea brick.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HOUSEWIFE02755_000_026<tab>Hmm, I am not so sure my boys would like that. I think I shall go and buy meat from another stall.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HOUSEWIFE02755_000_027<tab>That does sound nice, doesn't it. I will take your finest mammoth thigh!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SYSTEM_100_030<tab>You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SYSTEM_101_030<tab>You made a sale! Nicely done.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HAPPYBOY02755_000_030<tab>Give me a toy! Mummy said I could buy a toy because I've been good. I don't have much money so it should be something cheap. What can I buy?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q3_000_031<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A3_000_032<tab>A wooden horse.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A3_000_033<tab>A Kharaqiq board and pieces.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A3_000_034<tab>A cheap wooden flute.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A3_000_035<tab>A fancy multicolored doll.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HAPPYBOY02755_000_036<tab>That sounds like lots of fun! Give it to me!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HAPPYBOY02755_100_036<tab>It costs <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var> much!? Mummy didn't give me <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> much money.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_HAPPYBOY02755_000_037<tab>A flute? I've never played one before but maybe Daddy can teach me. I'll take it!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_WORRIEDMAN02755_000_040<tab>Oh, I pine for that buxom maiden so, but I know not how to express my feelings. Whatever should I do?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q4_000_041<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A4_000_042<tab>I've got just the book for you.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A4_000_043<tab>Scream of your love to all of Reunion.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A4_000_044<tab>Good things come to handsome gents.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A4_000_045<tab>You'll get nowhere with a face like that.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_WORRIEDMAN02755_000_046<tab>Sorry, did I look like I was soliciting advice? I was just heading home. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_SYSTEM_100_046<tab>You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_WORRIEDMAN02755_000_047<tab>A book, you say? Pray tell me, just what is it called?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q5_000_048<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A5_000_049<tab><var 1A 02 /var>A Beginner's Guide to Tumet Child Rearing<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A5_000_050<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Swim Like an Ejinn<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A5_000_051<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Adarkim Tactics: Advanced Edition<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A5_000_052<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Qalli Love Songs of Legend<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_WORRIEDMAN02755_000_053<tab>Are you mocking my love? There are other things I could be doing right now instead of taking your insults. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_WORRIEDMAN02755_000_054<tab>Love songs? Now that you mention it, I remember her saying she enjoyed music. I will take that book, thank you!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_060<tab>Do you think this necklace suits me? I just bought it from that stall over there.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q6_000_061<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A6_000_062<tab>Is that one of the eyes of Nidhogg!?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A6_000_063<tab>It looks lovely on you.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A6_000_064<tab>What a nice shade of scarlet.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A6_000_065<tab>We have even better jewelry here!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_066<tab>Tell me then, just what would you suggest I buy?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_067<tab>I am glad you think so! I fell in love with the color the moment I saw it and knew it had to be mine.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_068<tab>In fact, I had actually planned on buying two pieces of jewelry today. Do you have anything for sale?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_Q7_000_069<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A7_000_070<tab>Scarlet earrings.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A7_000_071<tab>A black bracelet.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A7_000_072<tab>A ruby ring.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_A7_000_073<tab>A sapphire ring.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_074<tab>Ah, those would go perfectly with my necklace! I will have them, thank you.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_075<tab>That said, I am quite taken with this ruby ring as well... Give me both the earrings and this ring!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_076<tab>Hmm, I am not so sure the color would suit me. It is awfully drab. No, I think that is enough shopping for today.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_077<tab>That looks very nice indeed. I shall take it!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_FASHIONABLEGIRL02755_000_078<tab>That said, those scarlet earrings would go perfectly with my necklace... Give me both the ring and the earrings!
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_080<tab>I must say I am very impressed. I had no idea there was still so much I had to learn about trading.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_081<tab>Up until now I had simply recommended whatever I thought was best. But it is clear that the customer's wishes should always be my top priority.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_082<tab>Thank you for all your help.
TEXT_STMBDZ504_02755_BAIDUR_000_083<tab>Perhaps you ought to rest for a while. It seems like this may all be a bit too much for you right now. Speak with me whenever you feel ready to try again.
